stories.Title: Gauss is ready to play
stories.Description: Samsung is entering the generative AI arena with a bang. Gauss, their new AI model, is geared towards language, image, and code, promising to transform most smart devices.
stories.Tweet: Gauss is ready to play 📦 Samsung is entering the generative AI arena with a bang. Gauss, their new AI model, is geared towards language, image, and code, promising to transform most smart devices. #ai https://techcrunch.com/2023/11/08/samsung-unveils-chatgpt-alternative-samsung-gauss-that-can-generate-text-code-and-images/

stories.Title: The power of Olympus
stories.Description: On the AI battlefield, "Olympus" is Amazon's secret weapon. With its sights set on OpenAI and Alphabet, this 2 trillion parameter LLM promises to make AWS even more appealing to enterprise clients.
stories.Tweet: The power of Olympus 📦 On the AI battlefield, "Olympus" is Amazon's secret weapon. With its sights set on OpenAI and Alphabet, this 2 trillion parameter LLM promises to make AWS even more appealing to enterprise clients. #amazon https://www.reuters.com/technology/amazon-sets-new-team-trains-ambitious-ai-model-codenamed-olympus-sources-2023-11-08/

stories.Title: Advertising just got easier
stories.Description: Google is simplifying ad creation by integrating the perfect amount of AI. Advertisers can now create unique text and visuals by using text prompts until they are satisfied with the outcome.
stories.Tweet: Advertising just got easier 📦 Google is simplifying ad creation by integrating the perfect amount of AI. Advertisers can now create unique text and visuals by using text prompts until they are satisfied with the outcome. #ai https://www.theverge.com/2023/11/7/23951220/google-performance-max-ai-generated-ads-campaign

stories.Title: An electron trick
stories.Description: MIT's innovative approach may bring us closer to the ability to sustain superconductivity at higher temperatures. A team of researchers has successfully confined electrons to a 3D crystal.
stories.Tweet: An electron trick 📦 MIT's innovative approach may bring us closer to the ability to sustain superconductivity at higher temperatures. A team of researchers has successfully confined electrons to a 3D crystal. #science https://interestingengineering.com/science/in-a-first-mit-researchers-successfully-trap-electrons-in-3d-crystal

stories.Title: Great news from “Dinky”
stories.Description: NASA's Lucy mission is an endless source of discoveries. Its recent flyby of the Dinkinesh asteroid has brought many revelations: it's a unique binary system with two space rocks in close orbit.
stories.Tweet: Great news from “Dinky” 📦 NASA's Lucy mission is an endless source of discoveries. Its recent flyby of the Dinkinesh asteroid has brought many revelations: it's a unique binary system with two space rocks in close orbit. #space https://gizmodo.com/lucy-dinkinesh-asteroid-contact-binary-1851000084

stories.Title: From an ancient era
stories.Description: NASA's telescopes are exploring the universe like never before. A newly discovered supermassive black hole in an early galaxy unravels secrets about their formation.
stories.Tweet: From an ancient era 📦 NASA's telescopes are exploring the universe like never before. A newly discovered supermassive black hole in an early galaxy unravels secrets about their formation. #space https://www.space.com/supermassive-black-hole-most-distant-x-rays-discovery

stories.Title: Time to deploy
stories.Description: The EU's discussions with SpaceX about Galileo satellite launches are nearing completion. Despite several challenges, the ESA is determined to boost Europe's satellite infrastructure by 2024.
stories.Tweet: Time to deploy 📦 The EU's discussions with SpaceX about Galileo satellite launches are nearing completion. Despite several challenges, the ESA is determined to boost Europe's satellite infrastructure by 2024. #rocketscience https://spacenews.com/eu-finalizing-contract-with-spacex-for-galileo-launches/

stories.Title: Prime care for everyone
stories.Description: Amazon is constantly improving its approach to healthcare. Now, Prime members can sign up for One Medical memberships, offering primary care services centered on affordability and quality.
stories.Tweet: Prime care for everyone 📦 Amazon is constantly improving its approach to healthcare. stories.Title: Budget-friendly approach
stories.Description: Hyundai keeps showcasing its commitment to electric mobility. Their investment in LFP battery development means more affordable EVs and reduced dependence on external sources.
stories.Tweet: Budget-friendly approach 📦 Hyundai keeps showcasing its commitment to electric mobility. Their investment in LFP battery development means more affordable EVs and reduced dependence on external sources. #hyundai https://electrek.co/2023/11/08/hyundai-plans-cheaper-ev-prices-lfp-batteries/

stories.Title: For a greener tomorrow
stories.Description: GM is actively seeking partnerships to advance eco-friendly EVs. Niron Magnetics, with its iron nitride magnets, presents an innovative solution to reduce dependence on rare earth minerals.
stories.Tweet: For a greener tomorrow 📦 GM is actively seeking partnerships to advance eco-friendly EVs. Niron Magnetics, with its iron nitride magnets, presents an innovative solution to reduce dependence on rare earth minerals. #generalmotors https://www.theverge.com/2023/11/8/23951557/gm-niron-magnet-iron-nitride-ev-motor-investment

title: Samsung unveils Gauss, Amazon's AI secret, More about Dinkinesh
description: In the ever-changing world of AI, it's all about evolution and adaptation, and Samsung is really taking that to heart. They've just unveiled "Gauss," a new challenger for ChatGPT. On the other side, Amazon's got its not-so-secret "Olympus" project in the works, aiming to shake up AWS. And as NASA keeps exploring the asteroid Dinkinesh, more cool stuff keeps popping up. I'm officially a follower of "Dinky."
